question:
Consider the following Statement about Madras?
  1. Madras was made as a Presidency in 1684
  2. The first municipal corporation in modern India was set up in Madras in 1688
Select the correct statement from the given options:
explanation:
• 1640-Construction of Fort St. George began
  • 1641-Madras was made as Chief of English factories on the East coast
  • 1684-Madras Made as Presidency
  • 1688-Municipal corporation was setup
